pkgmetadata.longdescription: Searching Parsimony Models with Genetic Algorithms // Methodology that combines feature selection, model tuning, and parsimonious model selection with Genetic Algorithms (GA) proposed in {Martinez-de-Pison} (2015) DOI:10.1016/j.asoc.2015.06.012. To this objective, a novel GA selection procedure is introduced based on separate cost and complexity evaluations.
